modName: Hjerim Home Improvement - Forge and Crafting Tools
summary: Adds a forge, crafting tools and a chest to the Hjerim front yard
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=lightblue]Hjerim Home Improvement - Forge and Crafting Tools v1.0 (by Volek)[/color][/size]

This mod adds the following to the Hjerim front yard:

* Smelter
* Forge
* Workbench
* Grindstone
* Tanning Rack
* Blacksmith\'s Chest 
* Wall Torches

All tools work as usual. The chest is safe, stored items won\'t disappear.


Installation:
Extract the Data folder from the zip file to your Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/ folder, and activate the esp file with the Skyrim Launcher.


Version history:
1.0 - initial release


I recommend using this mod together with my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2723]Player Home Map Markers[/url] mod.

Also, check out my other Hjerim Home Improvement mod, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2394]Secret Room Chests[/url]!
author: Volek
